Description: Pale-red pottery ostracon, from the body of the vessel, interior grooved and unevenly covered with traces of an unidentified black substance, with remains of five lines of black-painted demotic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389791) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389791)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
